member.summary: Interaction logic for LoginWindow.xaml
LoginWindow

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.#ctor
member.summary: Login window initialization in the center of the screen.

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.connectButton_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: The connectButton_Click method. Performing login to the database on 'Connect' button click. Uses DatabaseService.openConnection method and takes Login and Password parameters. Uses OpenSelectTableWindow method to open the SelectTableWindow window.

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.cancelButton_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: The cancelButton_Click method. Closing application on 'Cancel' button click.

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.Login
member.summary: The Login method. Connects to SQL Server using Windows Authentication

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.WindowsAuthentication
member.summary: The WindowsAuthentication method. Connects to SQL Server using Windows Authentication Uses DatabaseService.OpenConnectionWA method.

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.SqlServerAuthentication
member.summary: The SqlServerAuthentication method. Connects to SQL Server using SQL Server Authentication. Uses DatabaseService.OpenConnectionSSA method and takes Login and Password parameters.

member.name: M:ProjektSemestralny.LoginWindow.loginMethod_SelectionChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: The loginMethod_SelectionChanged method. Checks the selected authentication. If 'Windows Authentication' is selected, Login and Password text boxes are blocked. If 'SQL Server Authentication' is selected, Login and Password text boxes are unlocked

member.summary: InitializeComponent
